storyContext.title: Implement Documentation Ingestion Pipeline
storyContext.story: As a backend developer, I want to create a pipeline to scrape and process official HMSREG documentation from docs.hmsreg.com, so that the chatbot has a comprehensive and up-to-date knowledge base to draw answers from.
storyContext.productGoalAlignment: This story directly contributes to the overarching goal of providing the chatbot with accurate and current information, thereby enhancing its effectiveness and utility.

dependencies.dependency: text-embedding-004 (via Google Gen AI SDK, for embedding generation)
HMSREG Chatbot (the application relying on this knowledge base)

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: The ingestion script successfully scrapes all linked articles from docs.hmsreg.com.
Text is split into chunks of appropriate size (e.g., 500-1000 chars) with overlap using LangChain.
Each chunk is embedded using text-embedding-004.
The embeddings and metadata are stored in ChromaDB and persisted.
